title: Museum
shortDescription: Visit the OG Museum of Crypto Art: five collections of cutting-edge crypto art from across time and space. Then, bring your questions and queries to The Library, our AI-powered database of all things crypto art.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art
longDescription: Visit the OG Museum of Crypto Art: five collections of cutting-edge crypto art from across time and space. Then, bring your questions and queries to The Library, our AI-powered database of all things crypto art.

title: The Codex
shortDescription: Explore all 10,000 Art DeCC0s, from aesthetics to traits, from Agentic Personalities to entire identities. Dive in and see how we’re literally bringing Art DeCC0s to life.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art
longDescription: The most visually-diverse PFP collection in existence awaits. Explore the entire Art DeCC0s collection, search for your favorite traits, and across 100,000,000+ total words of description, discover every DeCC0s’s agentic personality: preferences, history, perspective, thought patterns, identity. Dive in and see how we’re literally bringing Art DeCC0s to life.

title: Adoption Center
shortDescription: Interact with our Art DeCC0 Agents! Chat 1-on-1, ask questions, form genuine connections, and take your new digital best friend home, all in one place.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art
longDescription: Find your perfect digital companion from the Art DeCC0s collection and bring them home. This isn't just about acquiring an NFT—it's about finding a partner for all your digital activity ahead. Browse through a rotating gallery of Art DeCC0s and chat with them for yourself. Discover their identities and personality traits, establish novel connections with Art DeCC0s AI Agents, and when you’ve found the right match, take your new best friend off the market. Go on, they won’t bite (even if you ask them to, weirdo).

title: Decc0 Launcher
shortDescription: Build your very own Art DeCC0 AI Agents. Fine-tune knowledge-bases, extend personalities, bestow preferences, teach, and send agents on quests, all from this simple ElizaOS interface.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art
longDescription: Build your very own Art DeCC0 AI Agents. Fine-tune knowledge-bases, extend personalities, bestow preferences, teach, and send agents on quests, all from this simple ElizaOS interface.

title: Codex API
shortDescription: Dig the Codex documentation and start building your own apps utilizing the 100 million words of personality data in structured form and all CC0 assets around Art DeCC0s.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: DeCC0 Printer
shortDescription: Turn your Art DeCC0s into stunning high-resolution prints with the click of a button. Developed and operated by Artscape.
author: Tor
longDescription: Our first Community App, developed and operated by Artscape, lets Art DeCC0 holders print any DeCC0 from their collection in stunning high-resolution. Simply connect your wallet holding an Art DeCC0, choose which you want to print, select paper type and size,  and your print will be produced and shipped from the nearest print hub to your location. About Artscape: Artscape provides high-quality fine art prints through token-gating. This enables artists, communities, and galleries to offer collectors authenticated physical versions of their digital artworks — including limited editions and signed originals.

title: Decc0 World Map
shortDescription: Every Art DeCC0 has a home. Discover them all in this interactive world map containing the hometowns and stomping grounds of all 10,000 Art DeCC0s.
author: Daïm Al-Yad
longDescription: Every Art DeCC0 has a home. Discover them all in this interactive world map containing the hometowns and stomping grounds of all 10,000 Art DeCC0s.

title: Meme Studio
shortDescription: Explore all memes created by the MOCA community. Copy and paste them across the interwebs. Join the Discord to contribute your own creations.
author: reneil1337

title: Decc0 Plaza
shortDescription: The most visually-diverse PFP collection in existence, on full display. Enter this bespoke Metaverse space, featuring dozens of Art DeCC0s spread throughout Untitled,xyz’s unMuseum 3D architectures.
author: Museum Of Cryto Art
longDescription: The most visually-diverse PFP collection in existence, on full display. Enter this bespoke Metaverse space, featuring dozens of Art DeCC0s spread throughout Untitled,xyz’s unMuseum 3D ROOMs architectures.

title: MOCA Substack
shortDescription: Sign-up for industry-leading writing about crypto art, AI, the metaverse, cryptocurrency, and web3 culture, released weekly.
author: Museum Of Cryto Art
longDescription: Sign-up for industry-leading writing about crypto art, AI, the metaverse, cryptocurrency, and web3 culture, released weekly.

title: Official Discord
shortDescription: Join the MOCA Discord to find fellow crypto art believers and stay up to date with the latest news around Art DeCC0s, the Vibe Studio, and more.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: mocaOS Github
shortDescription: Explore all open source codebases of the museum, the codex as well as a wide range of Vibe Studio apps that you can fork and customize.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: Decc0 Finder
shortDescription: Found a Decc0 somewhere on the web? Wanna know the id or name? Here you can upload or paste any decc0 pfp - we'll identify it for you and send you right into its codex profile.
author: Daïm Al-Yad
longDescription: Found a Decc0 somewhere on the web? Wanna know the id or name? Here you can upload or paste any decc0 pfp - we'll identify it for you and send you right into its codex profile.

title: MOCA Live
shortDescription: Come take a (sometimes boisterous, other times blasphemous) tour around the crypto art world with the Museum of Crypto Art's founder, Colborn Bell, and lead writer, Max Cohen.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: MOCA Manifesto
shortDescription: Our mission is to preserve the truth. A common truth is found when many voices are heard.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: MOCA Exhibitions
shortDescription: Explore all earliest exhibitions, in the metaverse and from around the globe, curated by the Museum of Crypto Art from April 2020 to June 2022.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: Press Room
shortDescription: Dive into the world of MOCA by exploring the stories and insights that have shaped the Museum of Crypto Art's journey.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: The NFTs
shortDescription: For all you NFT enthusiasts, view the actual tokenized artworks within MOCA's Collections.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: Coingecko
shortDescription: Your home for $moca token price-action.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: Rooms Archive
shortDescription: Dive into dozens of MOCA ROOMs, our bespoke 3D art galleries. Explore mind-blowing metaverse environments, and interrogate curatorial taste through the years.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art
longDescription: Dive into dozens of MOCA ROOMs, our bespoke 3D art galleries. Explore mind-blowing metaverse environments, and interrogate curatorial taste through the years.

title: Official Website
shortDescription: Before there was a Museum, there was this website. Journey back to our 2021 origins and see how far crypto art has come.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art

title: Legacy Museum
shortDescription: Explore our OG vision for the Museum of Crypto Art. Browse our first collections and early staking interfaces from 2021.
author: Museum Of Crypto Art
